about_the_game:
The Totoi simulator is a simulator to feel “Totoi” by slowly soaking in a hot spring, taking a sauna, or bathing in a water bath,

The Totoi Simulator is a simulator that allows you to feel “Totoi” by slowly soaking in a hot spring, taking a sauna, or taking a water bath.

Let's take a bath as many times as you like and look for the “Totoi”!

Do not take a long bath!

//////////////////////////////////////

Gameplay

"Totoi Simulator” is a new type of simulator in which you bathe in a hot spring and aim to become a totoi.

If you take too many baths in a hot spring, you will become “nodding off” and eventually your strength will decrease, leading to your death.

While you are in the hot spring, you can stay in the hot spring,

Furthermore, if you take an outdoor air bath or a water bath when you are strongly “overtired”, you can get in shape even more!

You can choose whether you want to stay in the hot spring while your life is being drained away, or you want to stay in the hot spring while soaking in the bath slowly!

When your strength is depleted, you can drink the drinks around the hot springs to recover.

Play over and over again, and take a bath over and over and over again!

Again and again, and again.

Again and again, and again.

Again and again, and again.

Again and again, and again.

Again and again, and again.

Again and again, and again.

Again and again, and again.

Again and again, and again.

////////////////////////////////////////////

Kugi Onsen is a historic hot spring that has been around since Tempo.

Its smooth texture and warming effects are especially recommended for women!

Translated with (free version)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: win10
  • Processor: intel AMD
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
